posts.post_content:
Sorry for the blurry images, my scanner doesn't like holders!  

Please PM or email me at [url]kris.sweckard@sbcglobal.net[/url] to purchase or with questions.

Prices are delivered, net to me, PayPal Friends payment preferred.

McQuillan Hindu back - SGC 1.5 (two creases) SOLD
Bates Hindu back - SGC 1 (several indentions) SOLD
Fromme - SGC 1.5 (embossed mark on upper left, initials written on back) SOLD
Herzog - SGC 3.5  SOLD
McGraw - SGC 1.5 (embossed mark on upper left)  SOLD
I will take Fromme and McGraw.PM sent.
Price Reduced on the final card in this round.  Maybe these pictures will show it better.  Thanks!
